message: Let's start fair. I take 99% and you get 1%. This way, we can avoid any conflict and get the game going.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's a good deal for both of us while time is still on our side.
Okay, let's be more realistic.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's still a good deal for you, considering the dwindling time and inflation.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly. Let's not lose any more money to inflation.
